snippet: The episode, involving a 15-year-old student at York Early College Academy in Jamaica, came two days after a fifth grader carried his grandfather’s loaded gun into another Queens school.
abstract: Police say 15-year-old boy attending York Early College Academy high school in Jamaica, Queens, has been arrested for bringing loaded gun to school.
lead_paragraph: The episode, involving a 15-year-old student at York Early College Academy in Jamaica, came two days after a fifth grader carried his grandfather’s loaded gun into another Queens school.

headline.main: Queens Teenager Arrested After Taking Loaded Gun to School, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Boy, 15, Is Accused of Taking Loaded Gun to Queens School
